t
-----Original Message-----
From: Intellectual Property LVMH FASHION GROUP [mailto:ipd@fr.lvmh-fashion.com]

To: Legal Response
Subject: Copyright and Trademark claims - TopBagZone.com
Importance: High


(See attached file: C D ISP Topbagzone_com.pdf)


       Andrea Almeida
       ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc
       1333 Stemmons Freeway Suite 110
       Dallas, Texas 75207
       USA



       January 5, 2007

       By email (legal-response@theplanet.com )


       Re: Copyright and Trademark claims


       Dear Mrs. Almeida:

       I  am  legal counsel for the LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER and MARC JACOBS
       companies  (hereinafter referred to as "LVMH") which are part of the
       French  group  LVMH  Mo
dmca.principal_name: LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER and MARC JACOBS
